text:
I had include the mail and activation package in the JMeter's /lib/ directory. 
But the Mailer Visualizer don't send a Mail. There it's independent if I use

button.
creator: mg@hyperformers.com

text:
I could test the Mailer Visualizer functionality by starting the test group. It 
seems it works properly. The subject (preconfigured) and the body of the e-mail 
received looks like this:

Subject:This is a JMeter Mail, Represent a Success
Body: URL Restarted: /pls/orasso/orasso.wwsso_app_admin.ls_login

I had first difficulties with mail.jar and activation.jar. JMeter could not 
find them altough I defined their location in the CLASSPATH. After I copied 
them in JMeter's /lib/ directory it worked.

I am interested in further results. Please keep me uptodate.
